sense.name: the social rank or status of someone
sense.examples: It will require someone of her standing in the community to speak out. He is in good standing with the press. They are not a company with a reputable standing in this industry.

sense.name: a competitive rank in sports
sense.examples: Our team is ranked second in the national standings. Their standing went from first place to five games back.

sense.name: physically maintaining an upright position
sense.examples: John's standing on the street corner drew the attention of several passers-by. Continual standing all day resulted in foot problems for the hairdresser.

sense.name: maintaining a social situation or condition
sense.examples: It's an interdepartmental squabble of long standing. Unfortunately the cease-fire was only of short standing.

sense.name: the grounds or position something is based on
sense.examples: Her attorney feels the case has a solid legal standing. John's financial standing right now is pretty shaky.
